item.title: Shared Shortcuts
item.description: Chat https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/10995bc6b71d406795ed35e524e20063 Create a Prompt https://www.icloud.com/shortcuts/87f0fbfb0f514521a66f53552d2d1e32 Combined with Alfred. Download AIssistants Workflow Create a new WorkFlow Add a shortcut automation action Add a trigger to this action How to use this workflow In any app, select your question and enter ctrl + cmd, then wait the response. This workflow will replace your question with the answer.

item.title: How to use the shortcut action provided by AIssistant
item.description: AIssistant provides a series of shortcut actions to help you improve your productivity. You can use these actions to: Show your consumption status. Start a conversation quickly. Find your message. The following video is a tutorial of how to use shortcut actions provided by AIssistant.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: 1.WHAT INFORMATION DO WE COLLECT? Personal information you disclose to us In Short: We collect personal information that you provide to us. We colect personal information that you oluntarly provide to us when you express an interestin obtaining information about us or our products and Services, when youparticipate in activities on the Services, or otherwise when you contact us. Sensitive Information. We do not process sensitive information. Al personal information that vou provide to us must be true, complete.
